I actually started changing it last night and I'm waiting for a Vraska and a bow of nylea to arrive.

1 Psychic Intrusion 1 Nightveil specter 2 Soul Ransom 1 Ashiok Nightmare Weaver 1 Blood Scrivener 1 Underworld Connections 2 Duress 1 Hero's Downfall 1 Stab Wound 2 Reaper of the Wilds 1 Down and Dirty 1 putrefy 1 Bramblecrush 2 Sylvan Caratid 1 Fade into Antiquity 2 Elvish Mystic 1 Aetherling 2 Prognostic Sphinx 1 Oppurtoonity 1 Agoraphobia 2 Dissolve 1 Aetherize 1 Simic Charm 1 Prophet of Kruphix 1 Mystic Genesis 1 Urban Evolution
